actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the Town of Galveston, Indiana, for airport purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to grant releases from restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the town of Galveston, Indiana, for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the Town of Galveston, Indiana, for airport purposes.
